name: Eravola
description:
A flickering glance at a village when a Sage arrives, and people it affected.

An Interactive Text Game about the Investigation of a Curse.
Created for the WAG (Write a Game) Challenge, and awarded Runner-Up position.

Time to complete: 20-25 minutes.

Controls:
Use mouse to press buttons on-screen.
Escape to exit the game.
